page.title: 01Heolgerrig D Block.
page.content: The main built up area in the block is around Heolgerrig,Winchfawr and Swansea Road.Heolgerrig is an old village which has had new houses built on to it.The people who live there are mostly middle class. A lot of the land in the block is used for growing conifers.The rest is rough grass which is not good for farming and has been undermined. The main industry is Thorns Lighting Factory,a small clothing factory,brickworks and an open cast coal mine on the other side of the Aberdare mountain. There are not any important buildings in the block or any very old ones. The river which runs through the North East corner of the block is the River Taff.
